title: Conditions We Treat
description: Evidence-based treatment roadmaps for the most common joint and tendon pain concerns.
longDescription: From osteoarthritis to overuse injuries, our pain management specialists blend diagnostics, biologic injections, and rehab to get you moving again. Explore the key conditions below to see how we approach each one.

seo.metaTitle: Pain Conditions Treated | Regenerative Pain Management | Dr. SNA
seo.metaDescription: Learn how we treat knee, hip, shoulder, elbow, hand & wrist, and foot & ankle pain using regenerative medicine in London.

hero.headline: Targeted Plans for Lasting Relief
hero.subheadline: Every joint has a dedicated protocol combining imaging, injections, and rehab.

introduction.title: Regenerative Pathways for Common Conditions
introduction.content: Click through to see injection options, recovery timelines, and supportive therapies for each area. Plans may include PRP, BMAC, adipose cell therapy, Arthrosamid®, and personalised physiotherapy.

treatmentCategories.title: Lower Limb
treatmentCategories.description: Restore strength and cushioning to weight-bearing joints.

treatmentCategories.title: Upper Limb
treatmentCategories.description: Repair tendons and joints for pain-free work and sport.

knee-treatment.title: Knee Pain & Osteoarthritis
knee-treatment.shortDescription: PRP, Arthrosamid®, and BMAC plans tailored to your X-rays and activity goals.
knee-treatment.description: We combine biologic injections with bracing and strength coaching to cushion cartilage, calm inflammation, and keep you active.

hip-treatment.title: Hip Arthritis & Labral Pain
hip-treatment.shortDescription: Ultrasound-guided PRP or BMAC injections combined with gluteal strengthening.
hip-treatment.description: Designed to relieve deep joint pain, improve rotation, and delay or avoid hip replacement.

shoulder-treatment.title: Shoulder Tendon & Impingement
shoulder-treatment.shortDescription: PRP, tenotomy, and rehab for rotator cuff tears and bursitis.
shoulder-treatment.description: We stabilise the shoulder complex with targeted injections and physio to restore range of motion without cortisone.

elbow-treatment.title: Elbow Pain (Tennis & Golfer’s Elbow)
elbow-treatment.shortDescription: Targeted PRP + dry needling to repair tendinopathy.
elbow-treatment.description: Precision injections into the extensor or flexor tendon origin to reduce pain and rebuild grip strength.

hand-wrist-treatment.title: Hand & Wrist Pain
hand-wrist-treatment.shortDescription: Regenerative therapy for TFCC tears, arthritis, or carpal instability.
hand-wrist-treatment.description: Ultrasound-guided injections plus splinting protocols to protect fine motor control.

foot-ankle-treatment.title: Foot & Ankle Pain
foot-ankle-treatment.shortDescription: PRP and adipose cell therapy for plantar fasciitis or chronic ankle instability.
foot-ankle-treatment.description: Our protocols improve cushioning, reduce inflammation, and restore stability for runners and active professionals.

items.title: Outcome tracking
